participant_1.background:
I take a lot of pride in my appearance, even though I'm not the most outgoing person.
I drive a classic car because it reminds me of my family's history.
i like collecting rocks.
I spend my day engineering sustainable solutions for the environment while listening to the Rolling Stones.
I'm an artist who draws my friends as my little pony characters.

participant_2.background:
I love the rain because it gives me an excuse to stay indoors and read my romance novels.
I love to go to the deli because I can get a sandwich that is both delicious and affordable.
i wait tables at a cafe.
Others will be inspired by my work and see that it is possible to make a living doing what you love, even if you didn't go to college.
i have long fingers.

content.text: I love the rain! It gives me an excuse to stay indoors and read my romance novels.
Ah, I'm not much of a reader. I'm more of an artist.
Oh, really? What kind of art do you do?
I draw my friends as My Little Pony characters.
That's so cute! I'm sure your friends love it.
Yeah, they do. I'm also an engineer. I spend my day engineering sustainable solutions for the environment.
That's really cool! I'm just a waitress at a cafe.
I'm sure you're great at your job! I love the rain because it gives me an excuse to stay indoors and draw.
That sounds like a great way to spend a rainy day. I love to go to the deli when it rains. I can get a delicious and affordable sandwich.
I've never been to a deli. What's it like?
They're great! You can get all sorts of sandwiches, salads, and soups.
Sounds like I need to go to a deli sometime.
You definitely do! They're the best.
